Main.content: I need to explain what's really going on here.
About this island. About these tasks.
I need to ask - who are you?
Where do you begin and end?
That weapon you used, is that a part of you?
If not then what about the arms that hold it?
But you can separate an arm from the body - the rest is still you right?
Imagine separating more and more parts of the body.
At what point can we stop and conclude that the remainder is the true "you"?
Perhaps none of it is really you.
